description: Displays the details of an instance.

parameters.name: GatewayInstanceArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the gateway instance that you want to describe.

nested_items.name: GatewayInstance
nested_items.description: The gateway instance that you requested a description of.

nested_items.name: BridgePlacement
nested_items.description: The availability of the instance to host new bridges. The bridgePlacement property can be LOCKED or AVAILABLE. If it is LOCKED, no new bridges can be deployed to this instance. If it is AVAILABLE, new bridges can be deployed to this instance.

nested_items.name: ConnectionStatus
nested_items.description: The connection state of the instance.

nested_items.name: GatewayArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the instance.

nested_items.name: InstanceId
nested_items.description: The instance ID generated by the SSM install. This will begin with 'mi-'.

nested_items.name: InstanceMessages
nested_items.description: Messages with information about the gateway.

nested_items.name: Message
nested_items.description: The specific error message that MediaConnect returns to help you understand the reason that the request did not succeed.
